people_also_ask.question: What do the Psychonauts do?
people_also_ask.heading: Psychonauts is a platform game that incorporates various adventure elements. The player controls the main character Raz in a third-person, three-dimensional view, helping Raz to uncover a mystery at the Psychonauts training camp.
people_also_ask.title: Psychonauts - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.question: Was Psychonauts 2 successful?
people_also_ask.heading: Psychonauts 2 will no doubt be a commercial triumph, but it doesn't coast off the success of the previous iteration. It reprises and builds on the foundations of 2005, and unlike many sequels, does not take players for granted, promising many hours of gameplay and replayability.23-Aug-2021
people_also_ask.title: Psychonauts 2: The 2005 mental health-themed, award ...

people_also_ask.question: Is Psychonauts 2 Cancelled?
people_also_ask.heading: Psychonauts 2 was in alpha at this time. By June 2019 Double Fine had been acquired by Microsoft as part of Xbox Game Studios. ... Double Fine announced in July 2020 that the game was further delayed to 2021, which will allow for an Xbox Series X-optimized version to be released as well.
people_also_ask.title: Psychonauts 2 - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.question: What's the story of Psychonauts?
people_also_ask.heading: Against his father's wishes, a young psychic prodigy named Razputin ("Raz" for short) leaves his life in the circus and sneaks into Whispering Rock, a summer camp where young psychics like him can learn to use their powers, and maybe someday become "Psychonauts", psychic secret agents who battle the forces of evil.
